overview: Inspired by Seán Ó Ríordáin’s well known poem, this short film aims to capture the powerful energy of the work in a highly visual treatment. Working with a schoolgirl choir and inter-generational cast of female performers, the film pays tribute to Ó’Riórdáin’s language and radical vision of Women’s Christmas night.
title: Oíche Nollaig na mBan
